job title: Sr. Data Scientist (PhD, R or Python) - 14934
job description:
Our Fortune 500 Client is seeking a Senior Data Scientist with a PhD and experience in R or Python programming to design, implement and optimize algorithms for unsupervised and supervised learning based on structured and unstructured data. Develop powerful business insights from social, marketing, industrial data and public policy using advanced machine learning techniques. Work closely with the software engineering team to productize analytic software. Collaborate with system integration and data warehouse engineers on data extraction and data cleaning. Work in a highly interactive, team-oriented environment. Usually requires achievement of a Bachelors degree in Engineering, Mathematics, Economics or Statistics and 2-5 years of previous experience.

Additional Info:
  • The role will work within a cross-functional team environment, build pipeline to pull data, construct models, obtain insights from data, and communicate research results to production research and field production teams across 9 countries: United States, Mexico, Argentina, Brazil, Chile, France, Hungary, Romania, Turkey, and Ukraine.
  • The role is open due to the expansion of work. It includes both maintenance of current model and development of new models.
  • Long standing team that worked together for 2 years. Its a matrix environment, collaboration with team and across teams.
  • MUST HAVES: Solid research background, good analytics and coding capability, agile, and good communication skills. Coding with R or Python, knowledge in statistics, familiar with environmental data etc
  • Detail-oriented, data and analytics pipeline building skills, background in geospatial analysis.
  • Could extend or convert depending on performance.
